name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Biometric Device Serial Number Finder Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension helps users locate serial numbers for biometric devices, It also helps to diagnose the Installation Issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Name: Biometric Device Serial Number Finder Tool for Mantra MFS 100

Publisher: Nandeshwar Katenga (NSK Multiservices)

Description:
The Biometric Device Serial Number Finder Tool is a handy extension developed by NSK Multiservices to simplify the process of locating serial numbers for biometric devices. Whether you're a technician, IT professional, or system administrator, this tool streamlines the task of identifying serial numbers, saving you time and effort.

Features:

Efficient Search: Quickly search for the serial number of your biometric device with just a few clicks.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension offers a simple and intuitive interface, making it easy for users of all levels to navigate and use effectively.
Comprehensive Support: Currently, it support only Mantra MFS 100 Device, In furute we will add multiple devices.
Time-Saving: Eliminates the need for manual searching or troubleshooting, allowing you to retrieve serial numbers swiftly and efficiently.
Reliable Results: Provides accurate and reliable results, ensuring that you have the correct serial number for your biometric device.

How to Use:

Install the Biometric Device Serial Number Finder Tool from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar to open the tool.
Device information will be shown on extension page.
Click on the "Test your Device" button to test your Mantra MFS100 Device.
Copy or note down the serial number for your reference or further use.
